tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VolunteerPreferences (
    volunteer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    availability JSONB,
    preferences JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE volunteer_preferences (
    volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    availability TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE task_assignments (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    assigned_to INT,
    deadline TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_details TEXT,
    volunteer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Volunteers (
  volunteer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  availability JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Availability (
  availability_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_id INT REFERENCES Volunteers (volunteer_id),
  day_of_week VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL
);
